title: Oleoresins
desc:
Oleoresins are pure and natural extracts of spices and herbs that contain both volatile and non-volatile flavour components. Oleoresins are mainly used as a flavouring agent in the food processing industry, especially for meat preparations, marinades and gourmet food. The wide variety of oleoresins gives different flavours and colours to food products and thus manufactures can utilize many possibilities to formulate new or improved natural foods and flavourings.

Anthocyanin Natural India Pvt Ltd ensure impeccable quality Oleoresins which were abstracted with the help of sophisticated and modern techniques, which resemble the true essence of the raw spice. We are specialized in distillation & extraction process and make sure that the solvent residual levels are meet with the international standard with the help of most modern laboratory. With careful processing of Oleoresins we can reproduce flavour and aroma characteristics of natural spices which helps the manufacturers to standardize the flavour profile of a product and improve quality consistently. We also took much attention to take extracts from the finest quality raw materials and thus provide consistency in taste and aroma with faster release of flavour. Our Oleoresin can be used in their existing form or blended with Essential oils or raw spices to act as a base of seasoning, flavours and perfumes.Oleoresins are pure and natural extracts of spices and herbs ...
